column4: My printer won't share!.. under printer properties it says "shared" is ticked, but next to it it says "Not published, see server settings".... I can't find server settings - where is it?
point your web browser to the cups port - 631?
I went through the CUPS browser set up and set the printer to sharing, and it still says "not shared"
I went through the CUPS browser set up and set the printer to sharing, and it still says "not shared"
